text: Bruckman is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Amy S. Bruckman (born 1965), American associate professor *Clyde Bruckman (1894–1955), American writer and director of comedy films **Clyde Bruckman's Final Repose *Lodewijk Bruckman (1903–1995), Dutch painter * Shimshon Bruckman (born 1957), Israeli Olympic sailor ==See also== *Bruckmann
title: Bruckman
